name: LaboratoryServiceDefinitionType
title: Code system for types of laboratory service definitions
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations Work Group
description: This CodeSystem resource provides the concepts that enable to characterize laboratory diagnostic services described as instances of PlanDefinition, in the PlanDefinition.type element

concept.display: unitary measurement performed on an in vitro biologic specimen
concept.definition: laboratory service performing a single measurement

concept.display: collection of tests and panels performed on one or more in vitro biologic specimens
concept.definition: laboratory service comprising two or more tests and/or panels
